casebody.data:
W. A. WILKIE, Sometimes Known as Bud Wilkie, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. SANTLY BROTHERS, Inc., and Bernice Petkere, Defendants-Appellants. No. 433. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 14, 1938. Julian T. Abeles, of New York City (Edwin P. Kilroe and Charles S. Rosenschein, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Phillips & Nizer, of New York City (Louis Nizer and Arthur B. Krim, both of New York City, and George B. Harris, of San Francisco, Cal., of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On reargument, the decree, 91 F.2d 978, is affirmed.
